name: Beat Shooter (itch) (DinoNyte)
description:
This is a synthwave shooting game made for the Mini Game Jam 130. Bounce with the beats and destroy your enemies.

How it fits the Theme? Every 10 seconds your gun changes, with different recoils and reload times.

Objective:

Survive until the Song ends. There is also an endless mode where you can see how much time you can survive.

Only the mouse is required to play this game.

Credits:

This game is created be me - DinoNyte. 

Checkout my Youtube here: 

This game is inspired by Laserwave. Check it out:

All the music was taken from Pixabay.com.

Thanks for Playing!!
